name: Space Dummies
description:
Help the space dummies to solve their pipey puzzles ! Play with the mouse and keyboard or a controller.

The theme:

You will need to purposely lose control of characters to be able to solve most of the puzzles !

The team:
  • Hernz (@LoukaSoret)
  • PatteDeCanaard (@PatteDeCanaard)
Tools:
  • Engine: Godot 3.2
  • 2D tools: Krita, Gimp, inkscape, piskel

Every asset (except the music and sounds) has been made by us during the jam. We tried to use the most open-source tools as possible.

Musics and sounds used:
  • Puzzle tune by rezoner
  • Picked Coin Echo by NenadSimic
  • Sounds by wobbleboxx
